system.requirements:
Tier 1: Chaos Space Marine
Aptitudes: Unaligned
system.effect: Gain Weapon Training Talents for all Bolt, Chain, Melta, Plasma, Power, Flame, Primitive, Las, SP, Thrown, and Launcher Weapons. Effectively, become trained in all non-exotic weapons.

description.value: Gain Weapon Training Talents for all Bolt, Chain, Melta, Plasma, Power, Flame, Primitive, Las, SP, Thrown, and Launcher Weapons. Effectively, become trained in all non-exotic weapons.
